title: Ticket #2251: CHTC needs access to http://parrot.cs.wisc.edu/externals-private
description:
The job_ligo_x86-64-chkpttst fetches something from http://parrot.cs.wisc.edu/externals-private

Some NMI machines (currently just x86_64_sl_5.5 that I'm aware of) are run in CHTC. This machine cannot access that web directory on parrot.

See here for details: http://nmi-s006.cs.wisc.edu//nmi/run/cndrauto/2011/06/cndrauto_nmi-s006.cs.wisc.edu_1308268371_28660/userdir/nmi:x86_64_sl_5.5/job_ligo_x86-64-chkpttst-1.out
remarks: This machine is in CHTC, I added another IP range to the .httpaccess for /scratch/externals-private .
creator: kronenfe
